businessProfile.name: Detroit Pizza Factory #1 (Near Joy Rd)
businessProfile.address: 8471 N Telegraph Rd, Dearborn Heights, MI 48127, USA
businessProfile.formatted_address: 8471 N Telegraph Rd, Dearborn Heights, MI 48127, USA

reviews.text: Here is another Detroit style pizza place crossed off my list. I got the Carnivore pizza Detroit style. It was delicious but I think they forgot to add the sesame to the crust. The only problem that I have is that I had to order a large to have it Detroit style square pizza. The staff was very friendly and the restaurant was nice.

Saw this place mentioned on Instagram & had to give it a try.

We got a 12 slice New York style pizza with pepperoni & sausage. Even my picky eater ate his whole slice (rare, even with pizza).

10/10

This is definitely our go to pizza place. The specialty pizzas are SO good and the option to do half and half gives everyone what they are craving. Customer service has improved by a long shot and I appreciate the staff and the care they take in all aspects of our dining experience. I absolutely recommend them, IF they add a BLT pizza option to the menu üòÇ

Update* listen we go here at least once a week. Staff is GREAT and inviting, pizza is FIRE and we love it here!!!! Keep making pizza and cheese bread like this and we‚Äôre gonna keep coming back with more money!

I am in town visiting and hoping to get a taste of detroit style pizza. Unfortunately,  this place only served that style with a large version, so I opted for a NY slice instead. Overall, it's pretty tasty and well cooked. It's worth a look for travelers, but there are other options out there.

For Detroit style pizza in Detroit, this was just okay. On this Monday night, it was completely empty inside (I suppose everyone takes pizza to go) but there wasn't much activity inside at all. We almost thought it was closed pulling up to the parking lot.

The pizza took like 20+ minutes to come out. The crust was crispy, thick, and very enjoyable but if you're trying to get the best in town, this won't come close.

Food: 6/10
Atmosphere: 4/10
Service: 5/10
Value: 5/10

editorial_summary.overview: Simple pizzeria offering a range of specialty pies plus wings & hot subs for take-out or delivery.

The only problem that I have is that I had to order a large to have it Detroit style square pizza. The staff was very friendly and the restaurant was nice.

The pizza took like 20+ minutes to come out. The crust was crispy, thick, and very enjoyable but if you're trying to get the best in town, this won't come close.

customerMoodAnalysis.sentimentSummary: Customers have positive experiences overall. Your 4.0/5 rating from 5 recent reviews shows solid satisfaction with room for growth.

strengthsPerceived: Customers appreciate the friendly and inviting staff, which enhances their dining experience. - review management can highlight this positive aspect
The specialty pizzas, especially the option to do half and half, cater to diverse tastes and are a hit among customers. - social media marketing can showcase this strength
The restaurant's pizzas are so good that they keep customers coming back weekly, even with picky eaters. - Boostly marketing services can amplify this
improvementOpportunities: Limited availability of Detroit style pizza in smaller sizes - social media marketing can improve this area
Lack of atmosphere/ambiance awareness - social media marketing can improve this area
Long wait times - Boostly marketing services can improve this
